name: Dungeon It Yourself! (DIY)
description:
Help the hero to clear the dungeon by paving the way to the end of it. Level up the hero, find various equipment, and call a mercenary to help you defeat various monsters in an ever-changing dungeon.

Dungeon It Yourself! is a dungeon-maker game where you use a randomized set of cards to make paths (or rooms) and place enemies to help level up the hero. But be careful when placing a path, because it may put the hero at a disadvantage.

Feature

  • Pave your own path in a randomized dungeon
  • Equip various items
  • Various mercenaries that you can call to help the hero

Meet The Team
